mapper.select: SELECT tmu.water_price, tmu.cost_scale FROM tb_watermeter as tw left JOIN tb_collector AS tc ON tw.collector_code=tc.code LEFT JOIN tb_manager_user AS tmu ON tmu.id=tc.property_id WHERE tw.code=#{tableNumber}
(select id from tb_manager_user WHERE account=#{account}) UNION (select id from tb_manager WHERE user_name=#{account})

select id,account,password,name,user_type,cost_scale,ivision_proportion,phone ,ctime,(SELECT count(*) FROM tb_collector AS tc WHERE tc.property_id=tmu.id) AS 'count' from tb_manager_user AS tmu WHERE 1=1 AND user_type=#{status} AND (account LIKE #{value} OR name LIKE #{value}) ORDER BY ctime desc
